item.title: 🐹 Chen-speculation/auto-MCP-client (48 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: Chen-speculation

📝 Repository: Chen-speculation/auto-MCP-client

📄 Descrizione: A Go library implementation of the Model Controller Protocol (MCP). This library allows developers to easily parse MCP service configurations, generate corresponding MCP clients, and integrate them as callable tools within LLM agent systems. Focuses on providing reusable Go packages for building MCP-enabled applications.

⭐ Stelle: 48

🍴 Forks: 8

💻 Linguaggio: Go
